name: Repair Report
tag_list: auto-repair, auto-repair-network, car-repair, repairpal, automd, automd-com, car-repairs, car-repair-network, automd-competitor, repairpal-competitor, auto-bids, auto-repair-bids, new-auto-repair-company, auto-repair-company, fast-growth-company, high-pot
overview:
Repair Report is a network of trustworthy repair shops that use a unique method to remove the headaches of the auto repair process.

Instead of diagnosing vehicle repairs and providing drivers a quote leaving them to wonder if they are getting the best deal, certified Repair Report shops will publish diagnosed vehicle repairs online where competing shops can see the diagnosis and place their own custom service offer. Drivers are spared the arduous task of submitting diagnosis details into alternative sites or worse, calling local shops for alternative offers. With one interaction with a Repair Report shop, drivers are provided with multiple service offers enabling them to make better decisions with more information in less time, with less effort.

Simply stated, drivers now avoid the age-old headaches and stresses of auto repairs through the unique solutions only offered by Repair Report.
